sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")
  h1 休假申請
  .textArea
    p 休假類型：{{leaveType}}
    p 日期：{{date}}
    p 時間：{{timeFrom}} to {{timeTo}}
    p 共計：{{total}} 小時
    p 職務代理人:{{agent}}
  .circleButton(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
    router-link(to='/leave/Finish' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") 送出

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            color: {
            but: "#333333",
            bgc: "#A78E70"
            },
            leaveType: this.$route.query.leaveType,
            agent: this.$route.query.agent,
            date: this.$route.query.date,
            timeFrom: this.$route.query.timeFrom,
            timeTo: this.$route.query.timeTo,
            total: this.$route.query.total,
            daySum: this.$route.query.daySum
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style>
h1,p {
    color: #FFF;
   
}

.textArea {
  text-align: left;
  position: relative;
  left: 40%;
}

.circleButton {
  background-color: #A78E70;
  border: none;
  padding: 25px;
  font-size: 30px;
  height: 150px;
  width: 150px;
  margin: 0 auto;
  border-radius: 50%;
  line-height: 100px;
  transition: 0.6s;
  position: relative;
  top: 10%;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.circleButton:hover {
  box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4);
}
</style>
